questions: Why are total opens different between the summary page and the individual report?
Why donâ€™t total opens match between summary and report views?
Why is the open count higher in the detailed report than on the summary page?
answer: The summary page updates once daily for performance reasons, since it pulls data across many broadcasts. Individual broadcast reports, however, show live and up-to-date engagement numbers.

questions: What broadcast performance metrics are shown in the report?
What engagement stats are included in broadcast reports?
Which metrics appear in the performance report for a broadcast?
answer: Reports show open rate, unique clickers, total opens and clicks, device breakdown (desktop vs. mobile), heat maps, and open time categories (glanced, skimmed, read).

questions: Can you drill down into individual recipient behavior?
Is it possible to view engagement by specific recipients?
Can I track how each person interacted with the email?
answer: Yes. Reports let you view actions by individual recipients, ranked from most active to least. Drill-downs include full interaction history and per-link engagement.
